description: Learn how to efficiently manage your dog walking business with Dog Dollars, covering bookings, scheduling, client management, payments, and more.

modules.title: Introduction to Dog Walking Business Management

lessons.title: Getting Started with Dog Dollars
lessons.description: Overview of the Dog Dollars platform and its features for efficient dog walking business management.

lessons.title: Setting Up Your Business
lessons.description: Guided setup of your dog walking business on the Dog Dollars platform.

lessons.title: Managing Client Information
lessons.description: How to keep track of client details, preferences, and booking history within Dog Dollars.

lessons.title: Smart Scheduling for Bookings
lessons.description: Using Dog Dollars' scheduling features for efficient booking management.

lessons.title: Invoicing and Online Payments
lessons.description: How to generate invoices and receive payments through Dog Dollars.

lessons.title: Managing Revenue and Expenses
lessons.description: Tracking financials and understanding the financial health of your dog walking business.

lessons.title: Creating and Sending Report Cards
lessons.description: How to create professional report cards with photos and notes after each walk.

lessons.title: Effective Communication with Clients
lessons.description: Best practices for keeping clients informed about their pets through photos, updates, and notifications.

lessons.title: GPS Tracking for Transparency
lessons.description: Using GPS tracking to provide clients with detailed information about their pets' walks.

lessons.title: Business Analytics for Growth
lessons.description: How to use Dog Dollars' analytics tools to track business performance and make informed decisions.

lessons.title: Choosing the Right Plan for Your Business
lessons.description: Understanding Dog Dollars' pricing plans and selecting the best fit for your growing business.

lessons.title: Advanced Features for Established Businesses
lessons.description: Utilizing advanced features such as custom domains, walk packages, and bundles for a professional edge.
